verse.roman:
mamāpy anugrahaṁ kṛṣṇa
kartum arhasy aśeṣa-dṛk
govinda nīyatām eṣa
pitā te pitṛ-vatsala

synonyms: mama—to me; api—even; anugraham—mercy; kṛṣṇa—O Lord Kṛṣṇa; kartum arhasi—please do; aśeṣa—of everything; dṛk—O You who see; govinda—O Govinda; nīyatām—may he be taken; eṣaḥ—this; pitā—father; te—Your; pitṛ-vatsala—O You who are most affectionate to Your parents.
translation: O Kṛṣṇa, O seer of everything, please give Your mercy even to me. O Govinda, You are most affectionate to Your father. Please take him home.
